results.title: Earnings in conflict
results.brief_description: A proposal by Lord Wilfred Brown to combat the wages inflation in Great Britain. The narrative is set in the future, at a time when such a system has been adopted. An American TV interviewer is the linkman, making an enquiry into the “revolutionary” British procedure.
results.description: A proposal by Lord Wilfred Brown to combat the wages inflation in Great Britain. The narrative is set in the future, at a time when such a system has been adopted. An American TV interviewer is the linkman, making an enquiry into the “revolutionary” British procedure.

results.title: Early years at school
results.brief_description: This is a series of film dealing analytically with areas of importance and concern to teachers of children aged three to nine. Suitable for Tertiary level students and teachers.
